name: @pooltogether/current-pool-data
description: Published list of contract addresses for PoolTogether v3
author: PoolTogether Inc.

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags && yarn gitwarn
scripts.gitwarn: echo '*******************' && echo 'Please push your changes to Git' && echo '*******************'
